verb.description: Make or show a connection between.
examples: the study examines social change within the city and relates it to wider developments in the country as a whole
kids related to him because he was so anti-establishment
synonyms: be on the same wavelength as

verb.description: Give an account of (a sequence of events); narrate.
examples: various versions of the chilling story have been related by the locals

origin: Mid 16th century: from Latin relat- brought back, from the verb referre (see refer).
